response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It is an exceptional opportunity that aligns perfectly with your needs and interests. Given its high value to you, I propose a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant savings compared to the market value of $10,000. I believe this price reflects the quality and benefits of the product while ensuring you receive a great deal. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
